name: Palindrome (StrayTheDev)
description:
Palindrome is a game where you collect points as they fall from the sky. After a minute, these scores flip, turning your 17 points into 71! Play against friends in local multiplayer, or against a computer. You can even put two computers against each other and watch them play (don't ask me why you would do that though)

Some tips:

  • Don't be afraid to lose points! if you have 30 points and are running out of time, a single -1 would take you from a final score of 3 to 92! use this to your advantage to beat less knowledgeable opponents.
  • Speaking of less knowledgeable opponents, why not play your friends without telling them the twist? imagine the look on their face when they think they've won, only to realize they were playing checkers while you were playing chess.

Made In Scratch for the Coding Blocks Game Jam '23
